blocks.name: fveqvfvv
blocks.content: If a function's value at an argument is the universal class (which can never be the case because of ~ fvex ), the function's value at this argument is any set (especially the empty set). In short "If a function's value is a proper class, it is a set", which sounds strange/contradictory, but which is a consequence of that a contradiction implies anything (see ~ pm2.21i ). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)

blocks.name: fnresfnco
blocks.content: Composition of two functions, similar to ~ fnco . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnresfnco(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2)), wfn(ccom(c0, c1), c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2)), wfn(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), c2))
  syl2an(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wfun(cres(c0, crn(c1))), wfun(c1))
  fnfun(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1))
  fnfun(c1, c2)
  funresfunco(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), c2, cdm(c1), wa(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2)), wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1)), wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)))
  adantr(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2), wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)))
  syl(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)), wceq(cdm(cres(c0, crn(c1))), crn(c1)))
  fndm(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1))
  sylbb2(wceq(cdm(cres(c0, crn(c1))), crn(c1)), wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)), wceq(cin(crn(c1), cdm(c0)), crn(c1)))
  eqeq1i(cdm(cres(c0, crn(c1))), crn(c1), cin(crn(c1), cdm(c0)))
  dmres(c0, crn(c1))
  df-ss(crn(c1), cdm(c0))
  dmcosseq(c1, c0)
  adantl(wfn(cres(c0, crn(c1)), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2), wceq(cdm(c1), c2))
  fndm(c1, c2)
  df-fn(ccom(c0, c1), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnresfnco(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1)∧ c1[Fn]c2)→(c0 ∘ c1)[Fn]c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc(((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1)∧ c1[Fn]c2), (c0 ∘ c1)[Fn]c2, Fun((c0 ∘ c1)), dom((c0 ∘ c1))= c2)
  syl2an((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1), c1[Fn]c2, Fun((c0 ∘ c1)), Fun((c0 |` ran(c1))), Fun(c1))
  fnfun((c0 |` ran(c1)), ran(c1))
  fnfun(c1, c2)
  funresfunco(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(dom((c0 ∘ c1)), c2, dom(c1), ((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1)∧ c1[Fn]c2))
  syl(((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1)∧ c1[Fn]c2), dom((c0 ∘ c1))= dom(c1), ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0))
  adantr((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1), c1[Fn]c2, ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0))
  syl((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1), ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0), dom((c0 |` ran(c1)))= ran(c1))
  fndm((c0 |` ran(c1)), ran(c1))
  sylbb2(dom((c0 |` ran(c1)))= ran(c1), ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0), (ran(c1)⋂ dom(c0))= ran(c1))
  eqeq1i(dom((c0 |` ran(c1))), ran(c1), (ran(c1)⋂ dom(c0)))
  dmres(c0, ran(c1))
  df-ss(ran(c1), dom(c0))
  dmcosseq(c1, c0)
  adantl((c0 |` ran(c1))[Fn]ran(c1), c1[Fn]c2, dom(c1)= c2)
  fndm(c1, c2)
  df-fn((c0 ∘ c1), c2)
}

blocks.name: funcoressn
blocks.content: A composition restricted to a singleton is a function under certain conditions. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcoressn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))), wfun(cres(ccom(c2, c0), csn(c1))))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))), wfun(cres(ccom(c2, c0), csn(c1))), wfun(ccom(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))), wfun(ccom(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfn(ccom(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))), wfn(ccom(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfn(cres(c2, crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))), wfn(cres(c2, crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfn(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3)), wfn(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))))
  imp(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wfn(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))))
  syl(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wi(wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wfn(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wceq(cdm(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))))
  dmressnsn(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  simplbi2com(wceq(cdm(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wfn(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))))
  df-fn(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))
  fneq12d(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))), csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cres(c2, crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))))
  reseq2d(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1)), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))))
  syl6eq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1))), cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  fnsnfv(c0, c3, c1)
  df-ima(c0, csn(c1))
  adantl(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cfv(c0, c1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3)), wfn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c3), wfn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  syl(wfn(c0, c3), wfn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c3)
  sylib(wfun(c0), wfn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  funres(c0, csn(c1))
  funfn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))
  fnresfnco(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  fnfun(ccom(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  funeqi(cres(ccom(c2, c0), csn(c1)), ccom(c2, cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  resco(c2, c0, csn(c1))
}

blocks.name: funressnfv
blocks.content: A restriction to a singleton with a function value is a function under certain conditions. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jul-2017.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm funressnfv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wfun(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wfun(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), wrel(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wrel(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))))
  relres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))
  pm2.43i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))))
  imp31(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))))
  a1d(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))))))
  syl6com(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cdm(c1)))
  funfni(c2, c3, c0, wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cdm(c1))))
  biimpd(wa(wfun(c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c2))), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cdm(c1)))
  dmfco(c2, c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cdm(c1)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))), wceq(cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), csn(cfv(c2, c0))))
  dmressnsn(cfv(c2, c0), c1)
  com23(wceq(cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))
  syl6bi(wceq(cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))))
  eleq2(cdm(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)))), csn(cfv(c2, c0)), cv(hs0))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)))
  velsn(hs0, cfv(c2, c0))
  ex(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))
  mpbid(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))), wmo(hs1, wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wmo(hs1, wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wmo(hs1, wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  imp31(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wi(wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)))
  dmressnsn(c0, ccom(c1, c2))
  com13(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  simplbiim(wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wi(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))), wrel(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)))))
  dffun7(hs0, hs1, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))
  com13(wral(hs0, cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  ex(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wi(wral(hs0, cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)))), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))))
  rspcimdv(hs0, cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), c0, wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))), wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  mpbid(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wcel(c0, cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  adantl(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  snidg(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))

  eleq2(csn(c0), cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), c0)
  com23(wa(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  ex(wa(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wi(wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  moimdv(hs1, wa(wa(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  sylibd(wa(wa(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)))
  adantl(wa(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wi(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))))
  ex(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  mpi(wa(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0))))

  anim12ii(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1)))
  biimpd(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))
  syl5bb(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cv(hs2)))
  eqcom(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0))
  fnbrfvb(c2, c3, c0, cv(hs2))
  biimpcd(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1)))
  eqcoms(cv(hs2), cfv(c2, c0), wb(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1))))
  breq1(cfv(c2, c0), cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1))
  adantr(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1))))))
  sylancl(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  simpr(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))
  brcog(hs2, c0, c3, cv(hs1), universe, c1, c2)
  ad2antlr(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wb(wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1))))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, c3), wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, csn(c0)), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1))))
  biantrurd(wcel(c0, c3), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  snidg(c0, c3)
  brresi(c0, ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0), cv(hs1))
  ad2antlr(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))))
  eqcoms(cv(hs0), c0, wb(wbr(c0, cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))))
  breq1(c0, cv(hs0), cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)), cv(hs1))
  mobidv(hs1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wb(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  biantrur(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))))
  snid(cfv(c2, c0))
  fvex(c2, c0)
  mobidv(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))), wb(wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))))
  syl6rbb(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), csn(cfv(c2, c0))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0), cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))), cv(hs1))
  brresi(cfv(c2, c0), c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0)), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  dffun7(hs0, hs1, cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wa(wceq(cdm(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0))), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccom(c1, c2))), wfun(cres(ccom(c1, c2), csn(c0)))), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(c1, csn(cfv(c2, c0))))
}

blocks.name: funressndmfvrn
blocks.content: The value of a function ` F ` at a set ` A ` is in the range of the function ` F ` if ` A ` is in the domain of the function ` F ` . It is sufficient that ` F ` is a function at ` A ` . (Contributed by AV, 1-Sep-2022.)

blocks.name: funressnvmo
blocks.content: A function restricted to a singleton has at most one value for the singleton element as argument. (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm funressnvmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wfun(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  simplbiim(wfun(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wrel(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))))
  dffun6(hs0, s1, cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  syl(wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  spimvw(hs0, s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  moimdv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  breq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))
  moimi(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  biimpri(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))
  mpbiran(wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0))))
  vsnid(s0)
  brresi(cv(s0), c0, csn(cv(s0)), cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funressnvmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun((c0 |` { s0 }))→ ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  simplbiim(Fun((c0 |` { s0 })), ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1), Rel((c0 |` { s0 })), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)))
  dffun6(hs0, s1, (c0 |` { s0 }))
  syl(∀(hs0, ∃*(s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)), ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1), ∃*(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  spimvw(hs0, s0, ∃*(s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1), ∃*(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  moimdv(s1, hs0 = s0, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)
  biimpd(hs0 = s0, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, (s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1 ↔ hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  breq1(s0, hs0, (c0 |` { s0 }), s1)
  moimi(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, s0[c0]s1)
  biimpri(s0[c0]s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)
  mpbiran(s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, s0[c0]s1, s0 ∈ { s0 })
  vsnid(s0)
  brresi(s0, c0, { s0 }, s1)
  vex(s1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 |` { s0 }))
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, { s0 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃*(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: funressnvmoOLD
blocks.content: Old proof of ~ funressnvmo . Obsolete as of 9-Oct-2022. (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm funressnvmoOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wfun(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wfun(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  simplbiim(wfun(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wrel(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))))
  dffun6(hs0, s1, cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  syl(wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  spimvw(hs0, s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  moimdv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)))
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  breq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))
  moimi(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  sylanblrc(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0))))
  id(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  vsnid(s0)
  brresOLD2(cv(s0), c0, csn(cv(s0)), cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cres(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funressnvmoOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun((c0 |` { s0 }))→ ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((Fun((c0 |` { s0 }))→ ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), d(s0, c0))
  simplbiim(Fun((c0 |` { s0 })), ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1), Rel((c0 |` { s0 })), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)))
  dffun6(hs0, s1, (c0 |` { s0 }))
  syl(∀(hs0, ∃*(s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)), ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1), ∃*(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  spimvw(hs0, s0, ∃*(s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1), ∃*(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  moimdv(s1, hs0 = s0, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)
  biimpd(hs0 = s0, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, (s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1 ↔ hs0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  breq1(s0, hs0, (c0 |` { s0 }), s1)
  moimi(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, s0[c0]s1)
  sylanblrc(s0[c0]s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1, s0[c0]s1, s0 ∈ { s0 })
  id(s0[c0]s1)
  vsnid(s0)
  brresOLD2(s0, c0, { s0 }, s1)
  vex(s1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 |` { s0 }))
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, { s0 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃*(s1, s0[(c0 |` { s0 })]s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: funressnmo
blocks.content: A function restricted to a singleton has at most one value for the singleton element as argument. (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm funressnmo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(cres(c2, csn(c0)))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(cres(c2, csn(c0)))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(cres(c2, csn(c0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wfun(cres(c2, csn(c0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))), wi(wfun(cres(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wfun(cres(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wfun(cres(c2, csn(c0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0))))
  funeqd(cres(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cres(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  reseq2d(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  mobidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cv(s0))
  funressnvmo(hs0, s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wfun(cres(c2, csn(c0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funressnmo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ Fun((c2 |` { c0 })))→ ∃*(s0, c0[c2]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ Fun((c2 |` { c0 })))→ ∃*(s0, c0[c2]s0)), d(s0, c1))
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, Fun((c2 |` { c0 })), ∃*(s0, c0[c2]s0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (Fun((c2 |` { c0 }))→ ∃*(s0, c0[c2]s0)), (Fun((c2 |` { hs0 }))→ ∃*(s0, hs0[c2]s0)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, Fun((c2 |` { hs0 })), ∃*(s0, hs0[c2]s0), Fun((c2 |` { c0 })), ∃*(s0, c0[c2]s0))
  funeqd((c2 |` { hs0 }), (c2 |` { c0 }), hs0 = c0)
  reseq2d(c2, { hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  mobidv(s0, hs0 = c0, hs0[c2]s0, c0[c2]s0)
  breq1(hs0, c0, c2, s0)
  funressnvmo(hs0, s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun((c2 |` { c0 }))→ ∃*(s0, c0[c2]s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: funressneu
blocks.content: There is exactly one value of a class which is a function restricted to a singleton, analogous to ~ funeu . ` A e. _V ` is required because otherwise ` E! y A F y ` , see ~ brprcneu . (Contributed by AV, 7-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm funressneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2)), weu(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2)), weu(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))), wex(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2)), wex(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c0, cdm(c4)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  simp1l(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  breldmg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)), wex(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))))
  eldmg(s0, c0, cdm(c4), c4)
  sylib(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2)), wi(wex(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))), weu(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2)), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0)))))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0)))))
  anim1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfun(cres(c4, csn(c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  funressnmo(s0, c0, c1, c4)
  moeu(s0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)))
}
